articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Dale Steyn dumfounded at Mayank Yadav's record IPL 2024 delivery as LSG debutant pays ultimate tribute to SA great - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As it turns out, Mayank Yadav is a huge fan of South Africa legend Dale Steyn | Cricket
articles.content: Cricket fraternity watched in awe as Mayank Yadav unleased thunderbolts after thunderbolts on Saturday night in Lucknow as home team, Lucknow Super Giants beat Punjab Kings to claim their maiden win … [+1949 chars]
